original_text: But Felix also hoped that Paul would give him some money. For that reason he often met with Paul and they talked together.
korean_text: 동시에 또 바울에게서 돈을 받을까 바라는 고로 더 자주 불러 같이 이야기하더라

sentences.original_text: that Paul would give him some money
For that reason he often met with Paul
sentences.korean_translation: 그 이유로 그는 바울과 자주 만났다
